advice.title: Advices
advice.sound: Use Firefox for faster animation playback. Enable background music in the top left if necessary. Turn your computer or tablet's volume to 100% and adjust the audio volume using the music volume bar.
advice.fullScreen: Clique F11 to enter full screen mode.
hints: You have 2 hints available in the top right corner
If that's not enough, a third hint will be available, providing you with the solution.

context.title: Context
context.welcome: Welcome to "Rea11y Inaccessible", a unique escape game where you will face the challenges of accessibility. This escape game immerses you in a society where the norms are very different from those you know.
context.explanation: Today, you will experience an immersive adventure, putting yourself in the shoes of people living with various disabilities.

disabilities.visual: Visual Disability: At times, your vision will be restricted or completely obscured. You will need to rely on your other senses to progress.
disabilities.hearing: Hearing Disability: Sometimes, the sound will be barely audible.
disabilities.cognitive: Cognitive Disability: Be sure to stay focused.
disabilities.motor: Motor Disability: Some puzzles will require patience with reduced mobility.
